## cilium map events

Display cached list of events for a BPF map

```
cilium map events <name> [flags]
```

### Examples

```
cilium map events cilium_ipcache
```

### Options

```
  -f, --follow          If set then events will be streamed
  -h, --help            help for events
  -o, --output string   json| yaml| jsonpath='{}'
```

### Options inherited from parent commands

```
      --config string   Config file (default is $HOME/.cilium.yaml)
  -D, --debug           Enable debug messages
  -H, --host string     URI to server-side API
```

### SEE ALSO

* [cilium map](cilium_map.md)	 - Access userspace cached content of BPF maps
